A virtual reality experience that allows users to see the world through someone else's glasses, and gain a new perspective on their surroundings.
A smartphone app that uses augmented reality to help people with visual impairments navigate their environment, and provides information about nearby objects and landmarks.
A 3D printer that can create custom-made glasses frames from recycled materials, reducing waste and promoting sustainability.
A wearable device that tracks eye movements and provides personalized recommendations for improving focus and productivity, such as adjusting the brightness and contrast of the screen.
A virtual assistant that can help people find and book eye appointments, answer questions about eye health, and provide reminders to wear glasses.
